Package com.intellij.openapi.projectRoots

Interface SdkModificator

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    MockSdk, ProjectJdkImpl, PyDetectedSdk

    public interface SdkModificator
    The way to modify the Sdk roots, home path etc.
    First you call Sdk.getSdkModificator()
    Then you modify things via SdkModificator setters, e.g. setHomePath(String)
    Last, you must call commitChanges()
